dashboard.label: SD-WAN VCO Events List
dashboard.definition: {"title":"SD-WAN VCO Events List","description":"","dataSources":{"ds_search_event":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"source=$svco$ enterpriseUsername=$entuser$ edgeName=$entedge$ event=$enttype$ category=$entcat$ severity=$entsev$ | stats count by event","queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}},"ds_search_severity":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"source=$svco$ enterpriseUsername=$entuser$ edgeName=$entedge$ event=$enttype$ category=$entcat$ severity=$entsev$ | stats count by enterpriseUsername=$entuser$ edgeName=$entedge$ event=$enttype$ category=$entcat$ severity=$entsev$ | stats count by enterpriseUsername=$entuser$ edgeName=$entedge$ event=$enttype$ category=$entcat$ severity=$entsev$ | stats count by enterpriseUsername=$entuser$ edgeName=$entedge$ event=$enttype$ category=$entcat$ severity=$entsev$ | stats count by enterpriseUsername=$entuser$ edgeName=$entedge$ event=$enttype$ category=$entcat$ severity=$entsev$ | stats count by source","queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}},"ds_search_list":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"source=$svco$ enterpriseUsername=$entuser$ edgeName=$entedge$ event=$enttype$ category=$entcat$ severity=$entsev$ | fields \"_time\", \"category\", \"edgeName\", \"enterpriseUsername\", \"event\", \"host\", \"segmentName\", \"severity\", \"source\", \"sourcetype\", \"_raw\"","queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}},"name":"ds-search-list"},"ds_search_vco":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":"now"},"query":"source=\"ds_sdwan_events:*\" | stats count by source"},"name":"ds-search-vco"},"ds_search_entuser":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":"now"},"query":"source=\"ds_sdwan_events:*\" | stats count by enterpriseUsername"},"name":"ds-search-entuser"},"ds_search_entedge":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":"now"},"query":"source=\"ds_sdwan_events:*\" | stats count by edgeName"},"name":"ds-search-entedge"},"ds_search_entcat":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":"now"},"query":"source=\"ds_sdwan_events:*\" | stats count by category"},"name":"ds-search-entcat"},"ds_search_entsev":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":"now"},"query":"source=\"ds_sdwan_events:*\" | stats count by severity"},"name":"ds-search-entsev"},"ds_search_enttype":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":"now"},"query":"source=\"ds_sdwan_events:*\" | stats count by event"},"name":"ds-search-enttype"}},"visualizations":{"viz_event_list":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":5,"list.drilldown":"none","list.wrap":1,"maxLines":5,"raw.drilldown":"full","rowNumbers":0,"table.drilldown":"all","table.sortDirection":"asc","table.wrap":1,"type":"list"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_list"},"title":"Raw VCO Event Data"}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"title":"Time Range","type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"}},"input_vco":{"title":"VCO","type":"input.dropdown","options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"\"ds_sdwan_events:*\""}],"token":"svco","defaultValue":"\"ds_sdwan_events:*\""},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_vco"}},"input_entuser":{"title":"Enterprise User","type":"input.dropdown","options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"token":"entuser","defaultValue":"*"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_entuser"}},"input_entedge":{"title":"Enterprise Edge Name","type":"input.dropdown","options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"token":"entedge","defaultValue":"*"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_entedge"}},"input_entcat":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"defaultValue":"*","token":"entcat"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_entcat"},"title":"Event Category","type":"input.dropdown"},"input_entsev":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"defaultValue":"*","token":"entsev"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_entsev"},"title":"Event Severity","type":"input.dropdown"},"input_enttype":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"defaultValue":"*","token":"enttype"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_enttype"},"title":"Event Type","type":"input.dropdown"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":1260},"structure":[{"item":"viz_event_list","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":10,"w":1180,"h":470}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_vco","input_entuser","input_entedge","input_entcat","input_entsev","input_enttype"]},"defaults":{"visualizations":{"global":{"showLastUpdated":true}},"dataSources":{"global":{"options":{"refresh":"5m","refreshType":"delay"}},"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"},"refresh":"5m","refreshType":"delay"}}}}}
